Error.Description: This is an error, the app couldn't find your move report which move you tried to add

Absorb.Description: You attempt to absorb some of an enemy's health. Make a melee attack. On a hit, the creature takes grass damage. Half the damage done is restored by the user.

Acid.Description: You create a stream of hot acid in a 30 foot cone, centered on you. Creatures caught in the cone must succeed on a DEX save, taking poison damage on a fail, and half as much on a success.

Acid Armor.Description: You are surrounded by a shield of thick acid for the duration. During this time, your AC increases by 2, and any creature that hits you with a melee attack must succeed on a CON save or takepoison damage.

Acid Spray.Description: You spit a spray of acidic fluid that works to melt away an opponent's defense. Make a ranged attack against a target, dealing poison damage on a hit. On a hit, the target must make a CON save against your Move DC. On a failure, the target's AC is reduce by 1 for the duration. This decrease may be stacked on an opponent, up to a maximum of -3 to its AC.

Acrobatics.Description: You nimbly attack a target with acrobatic prowess. Make a melee attack, dealing flying damage on a hit. If you are holding an item when you activate this move, the damage is halved.

Acupressure.Description:
You apply pressure to different stress points on your body, boosting a random ability for the duration. When activating this move, roll a d6 and gain the following boost based on the result. When activated on subsequent turns, any previous effect ends. 

| d6  | Effect |
|  1  | +1 to attack rolls |
|  2  | +2 to damage rolls |
|  3  | +10 temporary HP |
|  4  | +1 to saving throws |
|  5  | Critical Hit range +1 |
|  6  | +1 to Armor Class |

Aerial Ace.Description: You dive at an opponent with such speed that it is impossible for them to avoid.This move is guaranteed to hit for flying damage, unless during the invulnerable stage of Fly, Dig, Bounce, Dive, etc. moves.

Aeroblast.Description: You shoot out a powerful vortex of air that shreds through opponents. Any creature caught in a 50 foot line, 5 feet wide, must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking flying damage on a fail, and half as much on a save.

After You.Description: As a bonus action, choose an ally or opponent in range that has not yet taken its turn in the current round. The target must immediately take its turn now, and return to normal initiative order in the next round.

Agility.Description: You hone your abilities and feel a surge of speed course through your veins. Increase your movement speed by 20 feet for the duration. Applicable to any movement type the creature has.

Air Cutter.Description: You create a gust of razor-like wind to slash an opponent. Make a ranged attack against an opponent, doing flying damage on a hit. This move scores a critical hit on 19 and 20.

Air Slash.Description: You slash at an opponent with a blade of sharp air.Make a ranged attack on an opponent, dealing flying damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 15 or higher, the target flinches if it has not taken a turn this round.

Ally Switch.Description: You use a strange psychic power to teleport yourself and one willing creature in range, switching places on the battlefield.

Amnesia.Description: Your mind elevates to a new level of focus. Add +2 to any saving throw you make for the duration, but select one of your moves that is not Amnesia. You forget that move and cannot use it for the duration.

Ancient Power.Description: You lash out with unknown inner power. Make a melee attack roll against a creature, doing rock damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 19 or 20, all of your ability scores go up by 1 while you remain in battle. This move can be stacked for a maximum of +5 to all ability scores.

Aqua Jet.Description: You lunge at an opponent with incredible speed. Choose a target withing 10 feet of you. A burst of water propels you towards that opponent, avoiding all attacks of opportunity. Make a melee attack on that creature, dealingwater damage on a hit.

Aqua Ring.Description: You surround yourself with a veil of healing water. At the end of each of your turns, as long as you hold concentration, regain a number of hit points equal to your level.

Aqua Tail.Description: You lash out with your tail to strike an opponent. Make a melee attack, dealing water damage on a hit.

Arm Thrust.Description: You unleash a flurry of fists on an opponent. Make a melee attack roll, doing fighting damage on a hit. After successfully hitting a target, roll a d4. On a result of 3 or 4, you may immediately hit again for an additional 1d4 fighting damage. Continue this process until you fail to roll a 3 or 4 on the d4 roll, up to a maximum of four additional hits.

Aromatherapy.Description: You release a pleasant aroma that empowers your allies. All allies within a ten foot circle, centered on you, are cured of all negative status ailments.

Aromatic Mist.Description: You release an aroma that inspires your allies. When you activate this move, you and any ally within 5 feet of you may add a d4 to any saving throw they make for the duration.

Assist.Description: You call upon the help of another active creature in your party. When activating this Move, another player may immediately take an action in place of your own, if you have not already taken an action this turn.

Assurance.Description: You strike an opponent where it already hurts. Make a melee attack against an opponent, dealing dark damage on a hit. If the target has already taken damage in the same round, double the damage dice.

Astonish.Description: You startle an opponent with a loud shout . Make a ranged attack roll against an opponent doing ghost damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 15 or more, the opponent flinches.

Attack Order.Description: You summon your underlings to attack a foe. Make a ranged attack on an opponent, dealing bug damage on a hit. This move scores a critical hit on rolls of 19 or 20.

Attract.Description: As a reaction, when dealt damage by an attack, you may force the attacker to make a WIS save against your Move DC. On a fail, the creature must roll the damage again and use the lower result.

Aura Sphere.Description: You focus your aura into a concentrated blast that strikes an opponent in range. This move is guaranteed to hit for fighting damage, except when targeting an opponent in the invulnerable stages of Fly, Dig, Bounce, etc.

Aurora Beam.Description: You create a 40 foot line of freezing ice, 5 feet wide. Any creature caught in the line must succeed on a DEX save or take ice damage and be frozen.

Aurora Veil.Description: You use the environment to create a shield of ice around your body. Only able to be activated while it is hailing, this move can be used as a bonus action to halve all damage dealt to you for three rounds.

Autotomize.Description: You shed away part of your body to make yourself lighter and increase your speed. For the duration, your speed increases by 10 feet. This move may be stacked to a maximum speed increase of 30 feet.

Avalanche.Description: You send forth a heap of powerful snow to pummel an opponent. Make a ranged attack on a target, dealing ice damage on a hit. If the target has dealt any damage to you since the end of your last turn, double the damage you deal.

Baby-Doll Eyes.Description: You quickly widen your eyes in an attempt to charm an opponent, decreasing their will to fight. When you or an ally in range are targeted by a Move that requires an attack roll, you may use a reaction to impose disadvantage on the roll.

Barrage.Description: Make a ranged attack on a creature, rollingon a hit. You attack with a barrage of ranged strikes equal to the number shown. Each projectile dealsnormal damage.

Barrier.Description: You create a transparent shield of psychic energy. While active, the barrier grants +2 to AC for you and any companions within 5 feet of you for the duration.

Baton Pass.Description: As a bonus action, you may switch a creature out, passing along all negative status effects or stat changes to the new creature. This includes existing substitutes, critical hit bonuses, AC increases, etc.

Beat Up.Description: You use strength in numbers to attack a creature. Make a melee attack on a creature, and an additional attack for each conscious creature you are currently carrying, doing 1d6 + MOVE dark damage on each hit.

Belch.Description: You let out a damaging belch at a creature in range. Force the creature to make a CON save against your Move DC, taking poison damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. If you are holding a berry when activating this move, you may consume it and force the opponent to automatically fail the saving throw.

Belly Drum.Description: You sacrifice health for attack. When using this move, take damage equal to half your maximum, but increase your Strength score by 10 while you remain in battle. After activating this move, you are not affected by potions for the remainder of the encounter.

Bestow.Description: As a bonus action, you may pass your held item to a willing creature in range, if the target is not currently holding an item.

Bide.Description: You embrace the damage done to you, waiting for your time to strike. Use your attack action to activate this move, and keep track of all damage done to you before your next turn. On your next turn, you lash out at an enemy with a normal ranged attack, striking them for double the amount of damage you took on a successful hit. At 10th Level, you can choose to hold Bide for a second turn for the chance to add additional damage to the attack.

Bind.Description: You attempt to grapple a target into submission. Make a melee attack roll. On a hit, the target takes normal damage and is grappled. At the beginning of each of its turns, it may attempt to escape with a STR save against your Move DC. While a creature is grappled, you may continue this move, as a bonus action, to do an automatic 1d4 normal damage without having to make an attack roll.

Bite.Description: You sink your teeth into an enemy creature. Make a melee attack roll, doing dark damage on a successful hit. On natural attack rolls of 19 or 20, the target flinches

Blast Burn.Description: Explosive projectiles rain down upon your opponents in a 10 foot radius. Any creature caught in the blast must succeed on a DEX save against your Move DC or take fire damage on a fail and half as much on a success. This move saps you of energy, and you may not make any attack until after the end of your next turn.

Blaze Kick.Description: Flames burst from your feet as you deliver a powerful kick. Make a melee attack on an opponent, doing fire damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 18 or more, the target is burned. This move scores a critical hit on 19s and 20s.

Blizzard.Description: Icy clouds form overhead and pelt the ground with hail and snow, centered on a point you choose within range. Each creature in a 30 ft radius, centered on a point within range, must make a DEX saving throw against your Move DC, taking ice damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. Targets that fail the save by 5 or more become frozen.

Block.Description: If an opponent within range attempts to flee or switch out, you may use your reaction to stop it dead in its tracks, keeping this from happening.

Blue Flare.Description: You unleash an intense and beautiful line of blue flames in a 50 foot line, 5 feet wide. Any creature caught in the line must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking fire damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. If a creature fails the save by more than 5, they are burned.

Body Slam.Description: You thrust yourself towards an opponent in an attempt to crush them with your physical size. Make a melee attack on a target. On a hit, the target takes normal damage, and must succeed on a STR saving throw against your Move DC or be knocked prone.

Bolt Strike.Description: You send down a powerful strike of lightning from the heavens, surrounding an area of the battlefield with surging electricity. Any opponent caught in a 20 foot radius, centered on a point within range, must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking electric damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. If a creature fails the save by more than 5, it becomes paralyzed.

Bone Club.Description: You strike a creature with a club of bone, doing ground damage on a successful hit. If the natural attack roll is 18 or more, the target flinches.

Bone Rush.Description: You rush forward to deliver a series of hard hits against a target. Make a melee attack roll, doing ground damage on a hit. After successfully hitting a target, roll a d4. On a result of 3 or 4, you may immediately hit again for an additional 1d4 ground damage. Continue this process until you fail to roll a 3 or 4 on the d4 roll, up to a maximum of four additional hits.

Bonemerang.Description: You throw a boomerang and make two ranged attacks against a target. On each successful hit, do ground damage.

Boomburst.Description: You create a deafening, explosive sound that damages all creatures within 20 feet of you. Force any creature in range to make a CON save against your Move DC, taking normal damage on a failure, or half as much on a success.

Bounce.Description: When you activate this move, you bounce high into the air, disappearing into the Ethereal plane. You may not be targeted by attacks in the Ethereal plane. On your next turn, as an action, you reappear and attempt to slam down on top of an opponent. Make a melee attack roll on an opponent in range, with advantage, doing flying damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 15 or more, the target is paralyzed.

Brave Bird.Description: You tuck in your wings and dive at an opponent. Make a melee attack, dealing flying damage on a hit. On a hit, you also take a quarter of the total (rounded down) in normal-type recoil damage.

Brick Break.Description: You strike out with a powerful and focused punch. Make a melee attack roll on an opponent, doing fighting damage on a hit. On a hit, this move automatically ends an opponent's Light Screen, and bypasses Reflect with no effect.

Brine.Description: You send a harsh blast of salt water at an opponent. Make a ranged attack against an opponent, dealing water damage on a hit. If the opponent has less that 50% of its max HP, double the damage dealt.

Brutal Swing.Description: You swing your arms around violently, attacking anything within a 5 foot circle, centered on yourself. All creatures in range must make a DEX saving throw against your Move DC, taking dark damage on a failure, or half as much on a success.

Bubble.Description: You shoot a series of quickly moving bubbles at a target. Make three ranged attacks, doingwater damage on each successful hit.

Bubble Beam.Description: You shoot a concentrated stream of bubbles in an 80 foot line, 5 feet wide. Any creature caught in the line must succeed on a DEX save against your Move DC, taking water damage on a failed save, and half as much on a success.

Bug Bite.Description: You lash out and bite a foe. Make a melee attack against an opponent, dealing bug damage on a hit. If the target is holding a berry when you hit, you immediately eat it and gain its effect.

Bug Buzz.Description: You vibrate your wings, creating a harsh sound that damages any creature in range. All creatures within 20 feet of you must make a CON save against your Move DC, taking bug damage on a fail. If an opponent fails the save by more than 5, they have disadvantage on their next attack.

Bulk Up.Description: You pump yourself up, increasing your adrenaline. For the next minute, choose to add +1 to your attack rolls OR +1 to AC. This move can be stacked to a maximum of +5 for either choice.

Bulldoze.Description: You strike the ground so hard that it ripples out from you in a 15 foot circle. Any creature caught in the area must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking ground damage on a failure.

Bullet Punch.Description: You strike with a punch that is quick as a bullet. Choose a target withing 10 feet of you. You rush forward to slam a fist into the creature, avoiding all attacks of opportunity. Make a melee attack on that creature, dealingsteel damage on a hit.

Bullet Seed.Description: Your fire a series of high-speed seeds at an opponent. Make a ranged attack roll, doing grass damage on a hit. After successfully hitting a target, roll a d4. On a result of 3 or 4, you may immediately hit again for an additional 1d4 grass damage. Continue this process until you fail to roll a 3 or 4 on the d4 roll, up to a maximum of four additional hits.

Calm Mind.Description: You clear your mind of all distractions. For the duration, double your STAB bonus when dealing damage of your type.

Camouflage.Description: You blend in with your surroundings, taking on a new type for resistances/vulnerabilities/immunities. The type is dependent on the terrain, and up to the DMs discretion. (Ex: Forest = Grass, Beach = Water, Desert = Ground/Fire, Mountain = Rock, etc.)

Captivate.Description: You attempt to charm an opponent into pulling its punches. When hit by an attack from an opponent of the opposite gender, you may use a reaction to force it to make a CHA save against your Move DC. On a failure, the attack does not hit.

Charge.Description: Electricity surges through your body, charging up for your next attack. Until your next turn, boost your AC by 2. On your next turn, double your STAB bonus when dealing damage of your type.

Charge Beam.Description: You send a beam of electric energy at an opponent that has a chance to power you up. Make a ranged attack, dealing electric damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 10 or higher and the attack hits, add your proficiency bonus to the damage.

Charm.Description: You attempt to charm an opponent, sharply decreasing its attack. A target you choose in range must make a WIS save against your Move DC. On a fail, the target adds -2 to all attacks against you for the duration.

Chatter.Description: You shout a series of disorienting words at an opponent, scrambling their senses. Make a ranged attack. On a hit, deal flying damage and cause the target to become confused.

Chip Away.Description: You wait for an opening, striking with speed when the moment is right. Ignoring any boosts to the AC of a target, make a melee attack, dealing normal damage on a hit.

Circle Throw.Description: You swing the opponent around and throw it as hard as you can, away from the battlefield. Make a melee attack, dealing fighting damage on a hit. In wild battles, the target takes the damage and flees from battle if its level is lower than that of the user. In trainer battles, the target takes the damage and must be immediately switched out for another creature in the trainer's party, if any remain.

Clamp.Description: You clamp down on a target, attempting to deal damage and keep them in place. Make a melee attack roll. On a hit, the target takes water damage and is grappled. At the beginning of each of its turns, it may attempt to pry itself away with a STR save against your Move DC. As long as the target is restrained on your subsequent turns, this move can be activated again as a bonus action with an automatic hit, dealing 1d6 water damage.

Clear Smog.Description: You throw a clump of special mud that has the power to remove all stat changes from a target. Make a ranged attack, dealing poison damage on a hit. On a hit, any stat changes affecting the target since the beginning of battle are reset.

Close Combat.Description: You get in close for a devastating strike, sacrificing your defenses. Make a melee attack on an opponent, dealing fighting damage on a hit. After activating this move, the target has advantage on any attack it makes against you before the beginning of your next turn.

Coil.Description: You coil up and concentrate your power. For the duration, gain +1 to your attack rolls, damage rolls, and AC.

Comet Punch.Description: You strike out with a lightning fast punch. Make a melee attack roll. The target takes on a hit. After successfully hitting a target, roll a d4. On a result of 3 or 4, you may immediately hit again for an additional 1d4 normal damage. Continue this process until you fail to roll a 3 or 4 on the d4 roll, up to a maximum of four additional hits.

Confide.Description: You whisper an untold secret into the mind of an opponent in range. The target must make a WIS save against your Move DC, becoming confused on a failure.

Confuse Ray.Description: You target an opponent in range with a sinister ray of ghostly light. The target becomes confused.

Confusion.Description: You attempt to enter the mind of an enemy and cause confusion. Make a ranged attack on a creature in range. On a hit, the target takes psychic damage. If the natural attack roll is 15 or more, the target becomes confused.

Constrict.Description: You wrap yourself around a creature, trying to squeeze the life from them. Make a melee attack roll. On a hit, the target takes normal damage and is grappled. At the beginning of each of its turns, it may attempt to escape with a STR save against your Move DC. As long as the target is restrained on your subsequent turns, this move can be activated again as a bonus action with an automatic hit, dealing 1d4 normal damage.

Conversion.Description: You take on a new type for resistances/vulnerabilities/immunities, equal to one of the types of a move you currently know for the duration.

Conversion 2.Description: After taking damage from an attack, You may use your reaction to change your creature type to one of your choice that is resistant or immune to the type of move used against you for the duration

Copycat.Description: You mimic a target that acted just before you. When activating this move, you use the identical move of the creature whose turn came immediately before yours.

Cosmic Power.Description: You call upon a mystic force to come to your aid. For the duration, you have advantage on all saving throws.

Cotton Guard.Description: You protect yourself by wrapping your body up in thick, soft cotton. For the duration, boost your AC by +2.

Cotton Spore.Description: You unleash spores of thick cotton that covers the opponent. Force a target in range to make a CON save against your Move DC. On a fail, the targe's speed is reduced by 10 for the duration. If this reduction in speed causes their speed to be 0, they are restrained for the duration.

Counter.Description: When you are hit by a melee attack, you can use your reaction to make a melee attack of opportunity against your foe, doing fighting damage on a successful hit.

Covet.Description: You strike out with quick and sticky hands. Make a melee attack roll against an opponent, doing normal damage on a hit. On a successful attack, you steal the opponents held item if you are not currently holding one.

Crabhammer.Description: You slam down onto an opponent with a heavy claw. Make a melee attack roll on a target, dealing water damage on a hit. This move scores a critical hit on rolls of 19 or 20.

Crafty Shield.Description: You summon forth a mysterious power that blocks an incoming status condition. When you or an ally within 5 feet of you are subject to a status condition from an enemy move, you may use your reaction to nullify the condition.

Cross Chop.Description: You crush an opponent with a strong sideways strike. Make a melee attack against a target, doing fighting damage on a hit. Cross Chop results in a critical hit on 19s and 20s.

Cross Poison.Description: You slash at an opponent with a poisonous strike. Make a melee attack, dealing poison damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 19 or 20, the attack is treated as a critical hit and the target is poisoned.

Crunch.Description: You unleash a powerful blow that has a chance to temporarily lower a targe's defense. Make a melee attack against a target, doing dark damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 18 or higher, the targe's AC is decreased by 1 for the remainder of combat. This decrease may be stacked, up to a maximum of -5 to AC.

Crush Claw.Description: You strike out with powerful claws. Make a melee attack roll against an opponent, doing normal damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 15 or more, your next attack on the same target gets an additional +1 to hit.

Crush Grip.Description: You clasp your hands around an opponent for a crushing blow.Make a melee attack against a target, dealing normal damage on a hit. If the target is above 50% of its maximum health, add your proficiency bonus to the damage roll.

Curse.Description:
This Move has a different effect based on your creature type. 
If you are ghost-type: You attempt to put a curse on an opponent. Force a target in range to make a WIS saving throw against your Move DC. On a fail, the target is cursed. You takedamage initially and your opponent takesghost damage at the end of each of its turns for the duration. 
If you are any other type: You place a curse on yourself. For the duration, your STR and CON scores increase by 2, but your DEX score decreases by 4.

Cut.Description: You lash out at an enemy with vine or claw or blade. Make a melee roll on an enemy, doing on a successful hit.

Dark Pulse.Description: You target an opponent with a dark aura filled with horrible thoughts. Make a ranged attack on an opponent, dealing dark damage on a hit. On natural attack rolls of 17 or higher, the target flinches.

Dark Void.Description: You send the minds of your opponents into a world of darkness, putting them to sleep.  All creatures within 30 feet of you must make a WIS save against your Move DC, falling asleep on a failure.

Dazzling Gleam.Description: You emit a powerful flash that damages all creatures in range. Creatures within 20 feet of you must make a CON save against your Move DC, taking fairy damage on a failure, or half as much on a success.

Defend Order.Description: You summon forth your underlings to form a natural shield in front of you. For the duration, as long as you keep your concentration, gain +1 to your AC.

Defense Curl.Description: You curl up into a tight ball, increasing your defensive stance. Until your next turn, you gain + 4 to your AC and have resistance to normal attacks.

Defog.Description: You summon a swift, magical breeze in a 50 foot radius, centered on you, that sweeps away foggy weather and obstacles. When activating this move, any area of effect moves that are still active end immediately (Examples: Misty Terrain, Fog Cloud, Smog, etc.).

Destiny Bond.Description: You create a dark, internal bond with an opponent. Select a target in range, who must make a WIS save against your Move DC. On a fail, if you faint during the combat, the opponent must take damage equal to twice the damage of the same type that caused you to faint.

Detect.Description: You sense incoming danger and are able to quickly avoid it. When targeted by an attack, you may automatically avoid taking damage on the first instance of this reaction. On future reactions in the same combat, you must roll higher than a 15 on a d20 roll for the reaction to be successful.

Diamond Storm.Description: You stir up a massive storm of sharp diamonds in a 30 foot radius, centered on a point in range. Any creature in the area at the beginning of their turn takesrock damage. The Diamond Storm lasts for 3 rounds. When you activate this move, roll a d4. On a result of 3 or 4, your AC is increased by 2 while the Diamond Storm is active.

Dig.Description: Your creature burrows underground, disappearing from view before striking from underneath a foe. When you activate this move, you burrow underground and remain there until your next turn. During this time, you cannot be the target of any attack. On your next turn, make a melee attack on a creature in range, with advantage, doing ground damage on a successful hit. If the target has Tremorsense, the attack is not rolled with advantage.

Disable.Description: You attempt to disable a target, hindering its abilities. Choose a target in range. The target must succeed on a WIS saving throw against your Move DC. On a fail, roll a d4. Each of the opponent's moves is numbered 1 - 4 in alphabetical order. The move corresponding to the number rolled is unable to be activated for one minute. If the target has less than 4 moves, reroll until you get a lower result. If the target has the "Extra Move" feat, use a d6 and reroll on 6s.

Disarming Voice.Description: You let out a charming cry, dealing emotional damage to any opponent in range that can hear you. This move automatically hits for fairy damage unless a creature is in the invulnerable stages of Fly, Dig, Bounce, etc.

Discharge.Description: You let loose a flare of electricity in a 10 foot circle, centered on you, striking all creatures around you. Creatures in the area must make a DEX saving throw against your Move DC. On a fail, a creature takes electric damage. If a creature fails the save by more than 5, it is paralyzed.

Dive.Description: When you activate this move, you dive down and disappear into the Ethereal plane. You may not be targeted by attacks in the Ethereal plane. On your next turn, as an action, you reappear and attempt to strike an opponent from below. Make a melee attack roll on an opponent in range, with advantage, doing water damage on a hit.

Dizzy Punch.Description: You strike out with a devastating punch. Make a melee attack roll on a target, doing normal damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 18 or more, the target becomes confused. At level 17, a natural attack roll of 17 or more confuses the target.

Doom Desire.Description: You promise doom upon an opponent. When you activate this move, select a target and make an attack roll. On a hit, at the beginning of the third round after you activate this move, the target takes damage of no specific type. If the target is switched out, the damage is done to the trainer's current active Pokémon.

Double Hit.Description: You lash out quickly with two strikes. Make two melee attacks, dealing on each hit.

Double Kick.Description: You strike twice with two devastating kicks. Make two melee attack rolls, doing fighting damage on each successful hit.

Double Slap.Description: You reach out to slap a creature with quick strikes. Make a melee attack roll, doing on a hit. After successfully hitting a target, roll a d4. On a result of 3 or 4, you may immediately hit again for an additional 1d4 normal damage. Continue this process until you fail to roll a 3 or 4 on the d4 roll, up to a maximum of four additional hits.

Double Team.Description: You create a duplicate image of yourself, 5 feet beside you. The image copies every move you make. When an enemy hits you with an attack, roll a d4. On a 3 or 4, the image takes all the damage for you and disappears. Enemies with Truesight bypass the effect of this move.

Double-Edge.Description: You commit a massive attack against an opponent. Make a melee attack against a target, doing normal damage on a hit, but taking a quarter of the total damage (rounded down) in recoil.

Draco Meteor.Description: You summon forth a meteor shower that rains down on your opponents. All creatures in a 10 foot circle, centered on a point within range, must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking dragon damage on a hit, or half as much on a save. After activating this move, your next attack is rolled at disadvantage. If that attack requires a saving throw, the target has advantage.

Dragon Ascent.Description: You soar upward and come crashing down towards a creature in range at tremendous speed. Make a melee attack roll, dealing flying damage on a hit. After activating this move, any attack roll that targets you until the beginning of your next turn is rolled with advantage.

Dragon Breath.Description: You release a powerful breath of energy in a 40 foot cone. All targets caught in the blast must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking dragon damage on a fail, and half as much on a save. If an opponent fails the save by 5 or more, it is paralyzed.

Dragon Claw.Description: You strike out with a powerful claw attack. Make a melee attack on an opponent, doing dragon damage on a hit.

Dragon Dance.Description: You perform a mystical dance, pumping yourself up. For the duration, double your proficiency bonus when making an attack.

Dragon Pulse.Description: You open your mouth and send a shockwave of draconic energy at a target in range. Make a ranged attack, dealing dragon damage on a hit.

Dragon Rage.Description: You unleash a devastating flow of energy in a 100 foot long line, 5 feet wide. Each creature caught in the blast must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking dragon damage on a fail, and half as much on a save.

Dragon Rush.Description: You rush at an opponent with overwhelming menace. Make a melee attack, dealing dragon damage on a hit. On natural attack rolls of 17 or higher, the target flinches.

Dragon Tail.Description: You whip your dragon tail at an opponent in an attempt to send them away. Force a target to make a CON save against your Move DC. On a failure, they take dragon damage and are too frightened by you to remain in battle. In trainer battles, the target must be switched out if another creature is available. In wild battles, the target only flees if it a lower level than the user.

Drain Punch.Description: Your strike a foe with an energy-draining punch. Make a melee attack, dealing fighting damage on a hit, gaining half the damage dealt (rounded down) in HP.

Draining Kiss.Description: You attempt to zap the target's energy with a kiss. Make a melee attack roll on an opponent, dealing fairy damage on a hit. The user is then healed for half the damage dealt.

Dream Eater.Description: You tap into a sleeping creature's dreams, sucking from its energy pool. Instantly inflict psychic damage on a sleeping target in range, regaining half as many hitpoints to yourself.

Drill Peck.Description: You hammer down on an enemy with a peck attack. Make a melee attack roll on a target, doing flying damage on a successful hit. Drill Peck scores a critical hit on 19s and 20s.

Drill Run.Description: You crash into an opponent, spinning your body like a drill. Make a melee attack, dealing ground damage on a hit. This attack scores a critical hit on 19s and 20s.

Dual Chop.Description: You lash out at an opponent(s) with two quick strikes. Make two melee attack rolls, dealing dragon damage with each hit.

Dynamic Punch.Description: You strike out with a twirling punch that confuses your foes. Make a melee attack roll against an opponent, doing fighting damage on a hit. On a hit, it also becomes confused.

Earth Power.Description: You cause the ground beneath an opponent to erupt with power. Make a ranged attack, dealing ground damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 19 or 20, the next attack against the target is rolled at advantage.

Earthquake.Description: You create a tremor in the ground in a 10 foot radius, centered on you. Each creature in the area must succeed on a DEX save against your Move DC, taking ground damage on a fail and be knocked prone. On a success, they take half as much damage and are not knocked prone. The area becomes difficult terrain. Flying creature are immune to this attack.

Echoed Voice.Description: You release a shout that echoes across the battlefield towards an opponent. Make a ranged attack, dealing normal damage on a hit. Until the beginning of your next turn, if any other creature in range uses this move, they may double their damage dice on a hit. This multiplier can continue to stack to a maximum of 8x the damage dice, resetting if any of the attacks miss.

Eerie Impulse.Description: Your body generates a strange pulsating sound that can disrupt your opponent's ability to attack. When you activate this move, any creature within 30 feet of you must make a CON saving throw against your Move DC. On a failure, the target flinches for 1d4 rounds.

Egg Bomb.Description: You hurl a hard egg at a creature that explodes on impact. Make a ranged attack on a creature, doing normal damage on a successful hit.

Electric Terrain.Description: You electrify the ground around you to create a static field of electricity. For 3 turns, no grounded creatures inside the area can be asleep. Grounded creatures are those that do not have a flying speed or Levitate, Magnet Rise, or similar ability. In addition, creatures may double their MOVE modifier on damage rolls from electric-type moves activated inside the area

Electrify.Description: You suddenly surge with electric energy that transfers to your attacker. When hit by a melee attack, you may instantly use your reaction to force the attacker to make a CON save against your Move DC. On a failure, the attacking move's type is changed to "electric".

Electro Ball.Description: You hurl an electric orb at a target in range. Make a ranged attack roll, dealing electric damage on a hit. Compare the target and user's highest speed type (walking, flying, etc.). If the user's speed is higher, roll the next tier's damage dice for this move. In the case of level 17 or higher, double the damage dice.

Electroweb.Description: You unleash an electric net of web upon an opponent. Make a ranged attack roll, dealing electric damage on a hit, and reducing the target's speed by 5 feet. The target can use an action on its turn remove any web from its body. A target whose speed is reduced to 0 is restrained.

Embargo.Description: You surround an opponent in range with a dark aura. Force an opponent to make a WIS save against your Move DC. On a failure, the opponent cannot gain the effect of any held item or trainer item given to it for the duration.

Ember.Description: You hurl a ball of flame at an enemy within range. Make a ranged attack, doing fire damage on a successful hit. If the natural attack roll is 19 or 20, the target is burnt.

Encore.Description: After being targeted by a move, force an opponent to make a WIS save against your Move DC as a reaction. On a fail, the target can only use the move that targeted you for its next turn. At level 10, the number of turns an opponent must use the move changes to 2. At level 17, it changes to 3.

Endeavor.Description: When you activate this move, select an opponent in range. The opponent must make a WIS saving throw against your Move DC. On a failure, the targe's current HP reduced to be equal to your own. This move can not be used in the first round of combat.

Endure.Description: When damaged by an attack that would otherwise cause you to faint, you may instead fall to 1HP on the first instance of this reaction. On future instances of this move in the same combat, you must roll higher than a 15 on a d20 roll for the reaction to be successful.

Energy Ball.Description: You draw in power from nature in a concentrated ball that you send towards an opponent. Make a ranged attack, dealing grass damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 19 or 20, the next attack against the target is rolled at advantage.

Entrainment.Description: You dance with a strange rhythm that causes an opponent to mimic you. Choose a target in range and force them to make a WIS save against your Move DC. On a failure, choose one of their abilities to replace with one of your own for the duration.

Eruption.Description: You spew hot magma in a 15 foot cone. Any creature caught in the blast must make a DEX saving throw against your Move DC, taking fire damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. If you are at full health when activating this move, double your STAB bonus when dealing damage.

Explosion.Description: You create a sphere of energy that packs a concentrated and devastating explosion. Choose a target within range and roll a d20. On a 20, the explosion goes off and all creature within 5 feet of that point faint  On any other roll, the explosion fails to go off and this move has no effect. If the target's level is 10 more than your own, this move automatically fails.

Extrasensory.Description: You create an irritating, damaging sound in the mind of an opponent. Make a ranged attack roll against an opponent in range, doing psychic damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 19 or 20, the target flinches.

Extreme Speed.Description: You rush to attack with incredible speed. As a bonus action, you can immediately move up to 10ft and make a melee attack against a creature in range without taking an attack of opportunity, doingnormal damage on a hit.

Facade.Description: You strike out at an opponent with revenge. Make a melee attack roll against a target, dealing normal damage on a hit. If you are poisoned, paralyzed, or burned, double the dice for the damage.

Fairy Lock.Description: You summon forth a mystical power that locks down the battlefield. Creatures within a 40 foot circle, centered on you, may not flee or be switched out on their next turn.

Fairy Wind.Description: You stir up a series of vicious fairy winds that fly towards an opponent in range. Make a ranged attack roll against a target, dealing fairy damage on a hit.

Fake Out.Description: This move is only usable in the first round of combat. Make a melee attack on an opponent, doing normal damage on a hit, causing the target to flinch.

Fake Tears.Description: You fake an opponent out with superficial tears, lowering their defenses. When activating this move, a target must make a WIS saving throw against your Move DC. On a failure, all attack rolls against the target are given a +5 bonus until the end of your next turn.

False Swipe.Description: You swipe at an opponent but hold back power slightly. Make a melee attack against an opponent, doing normal damage on a hit. If this attack would normally cause an opponent to faint, it is reduced to 1HP instead.

Feather Dance.Description: You distract an opponent in range with a beautiful dance. The target must make a WIS saving throw against your Move DC. On a fail, the target cannot add proficiency to its attack rolls for the duration.

Feint.Description: You fake out an opponent before you strike. Make a melee attack against a target, dealing normal damage on a hit. If an opponent attempts to use a Protect or Detect reaction against the damage, it fails.

Feint Attack.Description: You bring an opponent close and hit it with a sucker punch. Make a melee attack on an opponent, always with advantage, doing dark damage on a hit.

Fell Stinger.Description: You lunge at an opponent with a devastating sting attack. Make a melee attack on an opponent, dealing bug damage on a hit. If this attack causes the opponent to faint, double your ability modifier to hit and deal damage on your next turn.

Fiery Dance.Description: You dance and flap your wings, sending flames in a 15 foot circle, centered on you. Anyone caught in the blaze must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking fire damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. If a creature fails the save by more than 5, double the MOVE modifier when adding damage

Final Gambit.Description: You risk everything and use your own life force to damage an opponent in range. When you activate this move, you faint, and force a target in range to make a CON save against your Move DC. The target takes an amount of fighting damage equal to your remaining HP on a failure, or half as much on a success

Fire Blast.Description: Two pillars of raging hot flames explode out from you and leap towards up to two creature in range. The creature(s) targeted must succeed on a DEX save against your Move DC, taking fire damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. Creatures that fail the save by more than 5 become burned.

Fire Fang.Description: You attempt to pierce an opponent with flame-cloaked fangs. Make a melee attack, dealing fire damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 19 or 20, the target is burned and flinches.

Fire Pledge.Description: You send a plume of flame towards an opponent. Make a ranged attack, dealing fire damage on a hit. After you land a hit, any ally that uses another Pledge move in the same round automatically hits.

Fire Punch.Description: You strike out with fire-infused fists. Make a melee attack roll, doing fire damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 19 or 20, the target is burned.

Fire Spin.Description: You release a series of moving flames that dance around a target. Make a ranged attack roll, doing fire damage on a hit. As long as you maintain concentration, the target takes an additional 1d6 fire damage at the end of each of its next three turns.

Fissure.Description: You crack open the ground with devastating force. Choose a target in range and roll a d20. On a 20, the target falls into the crack and vanished into the abyss. On any other roll, or if targeting a flying creature, this move has no effect. The area in a 20 foot radius around the target becomes difficult terrain. If the target's level is 10 more than your own, this move automatically fails.

Flail.Description: You flail about with a wild strike that increases in power the more injured you are. Make a melee attack roll against an opponent, doing normal damage on a hit. If you are below 50% of your maximum health, double the damage. If you are at 10% or below of your maximum health, triple the damage. The multiplier for this attack occurs before the multiplier for resistances or vulnerabilities.

Flame Burst.Description: You release a fireball that explodes on contact. Choose a point in range. Any creature within 5 feet of that point must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking fire damage on a hit, or half as much on a success.

Flame Charge.Description: You cloak yourself with flame and lash out at an opponent. Make a melee attack, dealing fire damage on a hit. With each successful hit from this move, increase your movement speed by 5 until you are incapacitated, are switched out, or the combat ends. (Maximum of +30 to movement speed)

Flame Wheel.Description: A wheel of flame explodes out from you in a 10 foot radius. All creature in the area must succeed on a DEX save against your Move DC, taking fire damage on a fail and half as much on a save. If the user is frozen, this move can still be used, thawing out the creature during the attack

Flamethrower.Description: You shoot a concentrated gout of flame in an 40 foot cone. Any creature caught in the cone must succeed on a DEX save against your Move DC, taking fire damage on a failure, or half damage on a success. Any creature that fails the save by more than 5 becomes burned.

Flare Blitz.Description: You cloak yourself in fire and charge at an opponent with serious damage. Make a melee attack against an opponent, dealing fire damage on a hit. On a hit, you take half the damage dealt in normal-type recoil damage. On a natural attack roll of 19 or 20, the target is burned. If the user is frozen, this move can still be used, thawing out the creature during the attack

Flash.Description: You emit an immense flash of light in a 20 foot radius circle, centered on you. Creatures in the area must make a CON save against your Move DC. On a fail, they are blinded until the end of their next turn. Outside of combat, this move can be used to light a dim area, much like the "Light" cantrip.

Flash Cannon.Description: You gather energy from the light around you and send a concentrated beam towards an opponent in range. Make a ranged attack, dealing steel damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 19 or 20, the next attack against the opponent is rolled at advantage.

Flatter.Description: You send mixed signals to an opponent. Select a target in range. They become confused, but during this confusion, they double their proficiency bonus when making attack rolls.

Fling.Description: You sacrifice your held item to throw it an opponent. Make a ranged attack. On a hit, the amount of dark damage dealt is equal to the price of the item in the manual, divided by 100 (rounded down), plus STAB (if applicable). After activating this move, on a hit or miss, the item disappears.

Flower Shield.Description: Large flowers sprout from any grass-type allies in range, boosting their defense. For one minute, as long as you keep your concentration, grass-type allies in a 15 foot circle, centered on you, gain +2 to their AC.

Fly.Description: You fly high into the air to prepare for a dive bomb attack. When you activate this move, you flap your wings and disappear into the Ethereal plane above you. You cannot be targeted by attacks while you are in the Ethereal plane. On your next turn, you use your action to reappear and make a diving melee attack on a creature in range, with advantage, dealing flying damage on a successful hit.

Flying Press.Description:
You dive at an opponent with quick reaction speed, able to change the type of attack when you reach them. Make a melee attack against a target, dealing flying OR fighting damage, depending on your choice. STAB can only added to this move if its type is fighting. 

!The APP does not add STAB for this move!

Focus Blast.Description: You heighten your focus and unleash it upon an opponent. Make a ranged attack, dealing fighting damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 19 or 20, the next attack against the opponent is rolled at advantage.

Focus Energy.Description: You sacrifice your action to focus in on the energy inside you. For the duration, increase your critical range by 1 (From 20 to 19+ , from 19+ to 18+, etc.). This move is stackable up to a maximum of +5 to the critical hit range (15+).

Focus Punch.Description: When activating this move, you spend your action focusing your next attack. If you keep concentration, as an action on your next turn, make an attack roll against an opponent, doing fighting damage on a hit.

Follow Me.Description: You entice all enemies to attack you. All ranged and melee attacks by any opponent in range must target you until the beginning of your next turn.

Force Palm.Description: You thrust your palm outward with such strength that a shockwave is sent towards an opponent. Make a ranged attack, dealing fighting damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 16 or higher, the target is paralyzed.

Foresight.Description: Force a target in range to make a WIS saving throw against your Move DC. On a fail, add +2 to all attack rolls you make against the opponent for the duration. Regardless of the saving throw, for the remainder of combat, any of your fighting or normal moves can hit a ghost type creature. If you are a ghost type, your ghost moves can now hit normal type creatures.

Forest's Curse.Description: You summon the energy of the forest to change the type of another creature. Force an opponent in range to make a CON save against your Move DC. On a failure, its type is changed to Grass for the duration.

Foul Play.Description: You turn an opponent's own power against it. Make a melee attack roll using your MOVE power. On a hit, the target takes dark damage using their own MOVE power.

Freeze Shock.Description: When you use this move, you charge up a ball of rock-hard ice. On your next turn's action, if you keep your concentration, you fire your electrically charged ice at an opponent. Make a ranged attack roll, dealing ice damage on a hit. On natural attack rolls of 15 or more, the target is paralyzed.

Freeze-Dry.Description: You unleash a freezing cold air that rapidly chills a creature in range. Make a ranged attack on an opponent, dealing ice damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 19 or 20, the target is frozen. This move deals super effective damage to water-type creatures.

Frenzy Plant.Description: You summon a whirlwind of jagged branches and razor sharp leaves that batter all opponents in a 15 foot circle, centered on you. All opponent caught in the flurry must make a DEX saving throw against your Move DC, taking grass damage on a failure, and half as much on a success. This move saps you of energy, and may not make any attack until after the end of your next turn.

Frost Breath.Description: You blow a gust of freezing cold air at an opponent in range. Make a melee attack roll, dealing ice damage on a hit.

Frustration.Description: You lash out at an opponent, venting your frustration at your trainer. Make a melee attack roll against an opponent, doing normal damage on a hit. When you make this attack, add an additional bonus to hit and damage equal to the number of levels you are below zero on the Loyalty Chart.

Fury Attack.Description: You reach out and unleash relentless strikes against a creature. Make a melee attack roll, doing normal damage on a hit. After successfully hitting a target, roll a d4. On a result of 3 or 4, you may immediately hit again for an additional 1d4 normal damage. Continue this process until you fail to roll a 3 or 4 on the d4 roll, up to a maximum of four additional hits.

Fury Cutter.Description: You unleash series of cuts against a creature that increase in strength. When you activate this move, make a melee attack on a target in range, doing bug damage on a hit. If you continue to use this move on consecutive turns, double the dice roll for damage each time you hit. The multiplier maxes out at 8x the original damage. The damage resets if any of the attacks miss, or if you are incapacitated.

Fury Swipes.Description: You reach out and unleash relentless claw attacks against a creature. Make a melee attack roll, doing normal damage on a hit. After successfully hitting a target, roll a d4. On a result of 3 or 4, you may immediately hit again for an additional 1d4 normal damage. Continue this process until you fail to roll a 3 or 4 on the d4 roll, up to a maximum of four additional hits.

Fusion Bolt.Description: You summon a gigantic lightning bolt that strikes down from the heavens in a 30 foot circle, centered on a point within range. All creatures caught in the blast must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking electric damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. If Fusion Bolt was already used this round, double the damage dealt.

Fusion Flare.Description: You summon a gigantic fireball that strikes down from the heavens in a 30 foot circle, centered on a point within range. All creatures caught in the blast must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking fire damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. If Fusion Flare was already used this round, double the damage dealt. Fusion Flare may be used to thaw out the user from the frozen status before attacking.

Future Sight.Description: You save an attack to unleash at a later time. When you activate this move, you may choose to attack on this turn, or delay the attack. You may use the attack as a free action at any time during the next three rounds. When you make the attack, make a ranged attack roll, dealing psychic damage on a hit.

Gastro Acid.Description: You hurl stomach acid towards a foe. Make a ranged attack. On a hit, the target is covered in the disgusting substance and cannot benefit from the effect of any of its abilities for the duration.

Gear Grind.Description: You send a pair of steel gears at a target(s) in range. Make two ranged attacks, dealing steel damage with each hit.

Geomancy.Description: You spend time to absorb the natural energy around you, sharply increasing your effect in battle. When you activate this move, you charge your energy and your turn is over. At the beginning of your next turn, for one round, your speed increases by 10 feet, and all of your attacks and saving throws are rolled with advantage.

Giga Drain.Description: You attempt to drain the life force of a target. Make a ranged attack on a target, doing grass damage on a hit. Half of the damage dealt is restored to the user.

Giga Impact.Description: You charge at an opponent with every ounce of your power. Make a melee attack, dealing normal damage on a hit. This move saps you of energy, causing you to be unable to make any attack until after the end of your next turn.

Glaciate.Description: You blow a wind of freezing cold air at an opponent in range. Make a ranged attack roll, dealing ice damage on a hit. On a hit, reduce the target's speed by 5 feet. A target reduced to a speed of 0 in this manner becomes frozen. The target may use an action at any time (before becoming frozen) to warm its body, resetting its speed.

Glare.Description: You stare into the depths of a creature's eyes with intense ferocity. The creature must make a WIS saving throw against your Move DC or become paralyzed. A creature that succeeds on this saving throw is unaffected by future attempts during this combat.

Grass Knot.Description: You attempt to ensnare an opponent with vines that sprout from the ground, causing it to trip. Make a ranged attack, dealing grass damage on a hit. If the targets size is Large or bigger, double the dice roll for the damage. On a natural attack roll of 19 or 20, the target falls prone.

Grass Pledge.Description: You send a column of thick grass towards an opponent. Make a ranged attack, dealing grass damage on a hit. After you land a hit, any ally that uses another Pledge move in the same round automatically hits.

Grass Whistle.Description: You attempt to put the target to sleep. The target must make a WIS save against your Move DC, falling asleep on a failure.

Grassy Terrain.Description: Grass sprouts from the ground in a circle around you, coating the earth with healing energy. For 3 turns, all creatures in the affected area heal forhit points at the end of their turn. Grounded creatures are those that do not have a flying speed or Levitate, Magnet Rise, or similar ability. In addition, creatures may double their MOVE modifier on damage rolls from grass-type moves activated inside the area.

Gravity.Description: You strengthen gravity in a 40 foot sphere, centered on you. Any opponent in the area cannot use moves like Fly or Bounce, and the Levitate ability is suppressed.

Growl.Description: You target a creature with an intimidating growl. The creature must make a WIS save against your Move DC. On a fail, it adds -1 to any attack it makes for the duration. This modifier can be stacked if it fails multiple growl saves, up to a maximum of -5.

Growth.Description: You increase the size of a target. When you use this move, a creature in range (or you) grows slightly larger, gaining the ability to add ato any attack roll or saving throw for the duration.

Grudge.Description: When you take damage from a move that reduces you to zero hit points, you may use your reaction to force the attacker to make a WIS saving throw against your Move DC. On a failure, all PP from the move that caused you to faint is depleted .

Guard Split.Description: You use your psychic power to change your defense to match your opponent's the best you can. Force an opponent in range to make a CHA save against your Move DC. On a failure, for the duration, your AC changes to become an average of your current AC and the opponent's, rounded down.

Guard Swap.Description: You use your psychic power to swap defenses with an opponent. Force an opponent in range to make a CHA save against your Move DC. On a failure, switch armor class with the opponent for the duration.

Guillotine.Description: You are filled with an incredible rage, grabbing the head of an enemy creature in an attempt to squeeze the life from it. Roll a d20. On a 20, you instantly cause the creature to faint. On any other roll, this move has no effect. If the target's level is 10 more than your own, this move automatically fails.

Gunk Shot.Description: You fire a wad of icky gunk at an opponent. Make a ranged attack, dealing poison damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 16 or higher, the target is poisoned.

Gust.Description: You create a strong wind that batters a target in range. Make a ranged attack, doing flying damage on a hit.

Gyro Ball.Description: You tackle an opponent with a high-speed spin. Make a melee attack against an opponent, dealing steel damage on a hit. If your DEX score is lower than the opponent's, double the dice roll for damage.

Hail.Description: You stir up a massive hail storm in a 30 foot radius, centered on a point in range. Any non ice-type creature in the area at the beginning of their turn take an amount of ice damage equal to their level divided by 4, rounded up. The hail storm lasts for 3 rounds.

Hammer Arm.Description: You put all your power into a strong and heavy fist attack. Make a melee attack, dealing fighting damage on a hit. Until the beginning of your next turn, you have disadvantage on all DEX saves and your speed is halved.

Happy Hour.Description: You celebrate your impending victory with a little jig. Prize money awarded at the end of battle is doubled.

Harden.Description: You increase your defense, adding + 1 to your AC. This effect can be stacked with multiple Harden moves, to a maximum of + 5 AC. Your AC returns to normal after combat.

Haze.Description: You create a haze of light snow that washes over the creature in a 30ft circle, centered on you. Any stat bonuses or modifiers, status effects, shields or other outside forces affecting the stats or abilities of a creature are removed. This includes things like Leech Seed, Reflect, and Light Screen.

Head Charge.Description: You lower your head and charge at an opponent. Make a melee attack. On a hit, you deal normal damage, taking a quarter of the total damage (rounded down) in recoil.

Head Smash.Description: You lower your head to deliver a dangerous headbutt. Make a melee attack, dealing rock damage on a hit. On a hit, the user takes 1/2 the damage dealt in normal-type recoil.

Headbutt.Description: You really know how to use your head. Make a melee attack roll, doing normal damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 18 or more, the target falls prone.

Heal Bell.Description: You ring a bell that chimes beautifully across the battlefield. All active allied creature in a 60ft circle, centered on you, are healed of their negative status effects.

Heal Block.Description: When an opponent within range attempts to use an HP recovery move, item, or ability, you may use your reaction to send psychic waves into the mind of the target, preventing the recovery of health.

Heal Order.Description: You summon forth your underlings to heal your wounds. Regain hit points.

Heal Pulse.Description: You emit a healing pulse that restores a target's HP. Choose a target in range (cannot be yourself). The target regains hit points.

Healing Wish.Description: You sacrifice yourself for another one of your trainer's Pokémon. When activating this move, the user faints, but the next creature released by its trainer is fully healed and cured of any status effects.

Heart Stamp.Description: You unleash a vicious blow after acting cute. Make a melee attack against an opponent, dealing psychic damage on a hit.

Heart Swap.Description: Force an opponent in range to make a CHA save against your Move DC. On a failure, you employ your psychic power to swap any changes in ability modifiers, AC, attack changes, damage boosts, etc. that are currently in affect on you or the target.

Heat Crash.Description: You slam into an opponent with your flaming body. Make a melee attack on a target, dealing a minimum of fire damage on a hit. Add an additional bonus to damage equal to your MOVE modifier for each size level you are above an opponent. (Sizes, in order, are: Tiny, Small, Medium, Large, Huge, Gargantuan)

Heat Wave.Description: You exhale a wave of hot breath in a 15ft. cone. Creatures caught in the area must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking fire damage on failure, or half as much on a success. If the creature fails the save by 5 or more, it is burned.

Heavy Slam.Description: You slam into an opponent with your heavy body. Make a melee attack on a target, dealing a minimum of steel damage on a hit. Add an additional bonus to damage equal to your MOVE modifier for each size level you are above an opponent. (Sizes, in order, are: Tiny, Small, Medium, Large, Huge, Gargantuan)

Helping Hand.Description: You can use a bonus action on your turn to choose one ally other than yourself within 60 feet of you who can hear you. That ally can add ato one ability check, attack roll, or saving throw it makes within the next 10 minutes, before the result of the roll is called by the DM. An ally being helped can only have oneavailable at a time.

Hex.Description: You send a ghostly energy at an opponent that does additional damage to those affected by status conditions. Make a ranged attack, dealing ghost damage on a hit. If the target is affected by a status condition, double your MOVE modifier when adding damage.

Hidden Power.Description:
You unleash a wave of force of unknown power at a creature in range. Make a ranged attack on an opponent, doing damage of a random type. Roll a d12 to determine which type of damage is dealt. 

|d12|Type
|1 |Bug 
|2 |Fighting 
|3 |Fire 
|4 |Flying 
|5 |Grass 
|6 |Ground 
|7 |Electric 
|8 |Ice 
|9 |Psychic 
|10| Rock 
|11 |Steel 
|12 |Water

High Jump Kick.Description: You leap into the air to deliver a strong kick to the enemy. Make a melee attack, doing fighting damage on a hit. On a miss, you take 1 damage.

Hold Back.Description: You lash out with force, but contain your strike to a glancing blow, leaving an opponent conscious. Make a melee attack on a target, dealing normal damage on a hit. This attack will always leave its target with 1 hp if it would otherwise cause the target to faint.

Hold Hands.Description: If you are within melee range of an ally, you grasp its hand to spread happiness. Use this reaction when an ally is attacking to add +1 to its attack rolls, or when it is targeted by an attack to add +1 to its AC. This reaction can be used only before the result of either attack roll (by ally or opponent) is called.

Hone Claws.Description: You sharpen your claws to increase the power of your attacks. For the duration, add an additional +1 to your attack and damage rolls. This move may be stacked to a maximum of +3 to attack and damage rolls.

Horn Attack.Description: You strike at an enemy with your horn. Make a melee attack, doing normal damage on a hit. If you moved 20 feet or more towards an enemy on this turn, force the enemy to make a STR save against your Move DC or be knocked prone.

Horn Drill.Description: You attempt to drill your horn through an enemy creature with tremendous strength. Roll a d20. On a 20, the creature is impaled and immediately faints. On any other roll, you miss and this move fails. If the target's level is 10 more than your own, this move automatically fails.

Horn Leech.Description: You sink your horns into an enemy, draining some of their power. Make a melee attack, dealing grass damage on a hit. Half the damage dealt is recovered by the user (rounded down).

Howl.Description: You increase your adrenaline with a menacing howl. For the duration, add +1 to any attack roll you make. This move can be stacked for a maximum of +5.

Hurricane.Description: You wrap an opponent in a fierce wind. Make a ranged attack against a target, dealing flying damage on a hit. If this attack is activated during rain, roll the attack with advantage. If used during harsh sunlight, roll the attack with disadvantage. If the natural attack roll is 15 or higher, the target becomes confused.

Hydro Cannon.Description: You fire a powerful stream of high-speed water at opponents in a 50 foot line, 5 feet wide. Any opponent caught in the blast must make a DEX saving throw against your Move DC, taking water damage on a failure, and half as much on a success. Creatures that fail the save also are pushed back 10 feet and fall prone. This move saps you of energy, and you may not make any attack until after the end of your next turn.

Hydro Pump.Description: You send a surge of powerful water towards enemy creature in an 30 foot line, 5 feet wide. Creatures caught in the blast must succeed on a DEX save against your Move DC, taking water damage on a failed save, and half as much on a success.

Hyper Beam.Description: You unleash a concentrated beam of pure energy in a 120 foot line. Any creature caught in the line must succeed on a DEX save or take normal damage on a fail and half as much on a save. This move cannot be used on consecutive turns by the same creature.

Hyper Fang.Description: You lash out at a creature with a quick fang attack. Make a melee attack roll, doing normal damage on a hit. Hyper Fang scores a critical hit on 19 and 20. If the natural attack roll is 18 or more, the target flinches.

Hyper Voice.Description: You release a loud and startling, high-pitched sound that only an opponent can hear. Make a ranged attack roll against an opponent in range, doing normal damage on a hit.

Hyperspace Fury.Description: Using your many arms, you send a barrage of three balls of furious energy at any creature(s) in range. Each ball automatically deals 1d6 dark damage to any creature(s) you choose. Reactions that negate damage such as Protect or Detect cannot be used. After activating this move, any attacks against you, until the beginning of your next turn, are rolled at advantage.

Hyperspace Hole.Description: You create a hyperspace portal that allows you to instantly teleport to an opponent in range and strike out with a melee attack. This move is guaranteed to hit for psychic damage. Reactions that negate damage such as Protect or Detect cannot be used.

Hypnosis.Description: You attempt to put the target to sleep. The target must make a WIS save against your Move DC, falling asleep on a failure.

Ice Ball.Description: You summon a rock-hard ball of ice that continues to pummel an opponent. When you activate this move, make a ranged attack on a target in range, doing ice damage on a hit. If you continue to use this move on consecutive turns, double the dice roll for damage each time you hit. The multiplier maxes out at 8x the original damage. The damage resets if any of the attacks miss, or if you are incapacitated.

Ice Beam.Description: You send a concentrated beam of freezing ice at a single creature in range. Make a ranged attack roll, doing ice damage on a hit, and forcing the target to make a CON save against your Move DC or become frozen.

Ice Burn.Description: When you use this move, you charge up an intense power within your body. On your next turn's action, if you keep your concentration, you unleash an ultracold, freezing wind in a 30 foot circle all around you. Anyone caught in the blast must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking ice damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. If any creature fails the save by more than 5, it is burned.

Ice Fang.Description: You attempt to pierce an opponent with ice-infused fangs. Make a melee attack, dealing ice damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 19 or 20, the target is frozen and flinches.

Ice Punch.Description: You strike out with ice-infused fists. Make a melee attack roll, doing ice damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 19 or 20, the target is frozen.

Ice Shard.Description: You flash freeze chunks of ice and quickly hurl them at an opponent. As a bonus action, you fire a shard of ice at an opponent in range, dealingice damage on a hit.

Icicle Crash.Description: You generate a row of icicles that crash down on top of an opponent in range. Make a ranged attack, dealing ice damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 15 or higher, the target flinches.

Icicle Spear.Description: Your pummel an opponent in range with multiple sharp shards of ice. Make a ranged attack roll, doing ice damage on a hit. After successfully hitting a target, roll a d4. On a result of 3 or 4, you may immediately hit again for an additional 1d4 ice damage. Continue this process until you fail to roll a 3 or 4 on the d4 roll, up to a maximum of four additional hits.

Icy Wind.Description: You create an icy wind that gusts towards a creature in range. Make a ranged attack against an opponent, doing ice damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 18 or more, the target falls prone.

Imprison.Description: You create psychic walls within the mind of a target in range. Force the target to make a WIS saving throw against your Move DC. On a failure, the target is unable to use any Move it knows that is the same as yours for the duration.

Incinerate.Description: You summon forth a burning hot flame that surrounds an opponent. Make a ranged attack, dealing fire damage on a hit. On a hit, if the target is holding a berry, it is immediately burned to ash, becoming unusable.

Inferno.Description: You engulf a target in intense flames. Make a ranged attack against a target, dealing fire damage on a hit, burning the target in the process.

Infestation.Description: You summon an infestation of tiny insects to attack a foe for multiple turns. Make a ranged attack on a target. On a hit, the target takes bug damage and becomes infested for 1d4 rounds. An infested creature must make a CON save against your Move DC at the beginning of each of its turns, taking bug damage on a failed save.

Ingrain.Description: You pierce the ground with roots, absorbing natural energy and fixing you in place. At the end of each of your next three turns (including this one), heal yourself for hit points as a free action. During this time, you may not flee or be switched out.

Ion Deluge.Description: You disperse electric particles that charge the battlefield. Until the beginning of your next turn, any normal-type move activated within 50 feet of you is considered electric-type.

Iron Defense.Description: Your body temporarily becomes solid as steel plate. Until your next turn, you gain + 6 to your AC and have resistance to all types of damage. If you were vulnerable, you now take regular damage. If you were already resistant, you become immune.

Iron Head.Description: You slam into your opponent with your hard head. Make a melee attack, dealing steel damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 16 or higher, the target flinches.

Iron Tail.Description: You swing your tail out, attempting to crush an opponent. Make an attack roll on an opponent in range, doing steel damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is a 19 or 20, the targe's AC is decreased by 1 for the rest of combat.

Judgment.Description: You send powerful missiles of pure energy to rain down on any opponent in a 40 foot circle, centered on a point in range. Any creature caught in the area must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. The type of the damage depends on the kind of plate the user is holding.

Jump Kick.Description: You leap into the air to deliver a strong kick to the enemy. Make a melee attack against, doing fighting damage on a hit. On a miss, you take 1 damage.

Karate Chop.Description: You extend a hand towards an enemy creature for a savage karate chop. Make a melee Attack roll, doing fighting damage on a hit. Karate Chop scores a critical hit on 19s and 20s.

Kinesis.Description: You move with incredible speed. Increase your walking, flying, or swimming speed by 20 if it is greater than 0, and add +2 to AC when targeted by ranged attacks for the duration. This move cannot be stacked.

King's Shield.Description: Your body is cloaked with a protective shield that negates all damage to you. When targeted by an attack, you may automatically avoid taking damage from this attack and any other damaging move until the beginning of your next turn. On future instances of this move in the same combat, you must roll higher than a 15 on a d20 roll for the reaction to be successful.

Knock Off.Description: You attempt to rid an opponent of their held item for the rest of battle. Make a melee attack roll against a target. On a hit, deal dark damage and any held item of the target disappears. The item appears back in the target's inventory when the battle is over.

Land's Wrath.Description: You gather in the natural energy of the land around you and focus it into a sudden eruption of earth in a 30 ft radius, centered on a point within range. All creatures caught in the blast must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking ground damage on a failure, or half as much on a success.

Last Resort.Description: You lash out an an opponent with a furious strike. This move can only be activated when all other known moves by a user have been activated in the same combat. If the user is switched out, this rule resets. Make a melee attack, dealing normal damage on a hit.

Lava Plume.Description: You unleash an inferno of hot flames at all creatures in a 20 foot cone. Creatures in the blast must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking fire damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. If any creature fails the saving throw by more than 5, the creature is burned.

Leaf Blade.Description: You attempt to slash an opponent with a sharp leaf. Make a melee attack against a target, dealing grass damage on a hit. This attack scores a critical on 19 and 20.

Leaf Storm.Description: You whip up a powerful storm of leaves in a 20 foot circle, centered on a point within range. All creatures in the area must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking grass damage on a fail, or half as much on a success. After activating this move, you are sapped of energy. Your next attack deals half the normal damage, if it hits.

Leaf Tornado.Description: You summon forth a cyclone of harsh winds and fast moving leaves that rushes forward to strike an opponent in range. Make a ranged attack roll, dealing grass damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 15 or higher, the target has disadvantage on its next attack. If the opponent activates a move that requires a saving throw, its target(s) have advantage on the roll.

Leech Life.Description: You attempt to suck away some of a creature's life force. Make a melee attack roll, doing bug damage on a hit. Half of the damage done is restored to the user.

Leech Seed.Description: You send a seed at a creature in range that implants itself in their hide. Make a ranged attack roll. On a hit, a seed implants into their skin. The target takesgrass damage at the end of each of its subsequent turns until it faints or is switched out. Half of the damage is restored by the attacker, or any other active creature the trainer has in battle, even if the original attacker faints or is returned to its Pokéball. Only one creature can be seeded by the attacker at a time.

Leer.Description: You stare down a target, reducing its will. The creature must make a WIS save against your Move DC. On a fail, allies may add +1 to any attack they target it with for the duration. This modifier can be stacked if it fails multiple leer saves, up to a maximum of +5.

Lick.Description: You reach out and lick a target. Make a melee attack roll. On a hit, do ghost damage. On a natural attack roll of 18 or higher, the target becomes paralyzed.

Light of Ruin.Description: You draw forth a powerful natural essence, concentrating it into a beam of light 80ft long and 5 feet wide. Any creature caught in the blast must make DEX saving throw against your Move DC, taking fairy damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. The user takes normal-type recoil damage equal to half the damage roll.

Light Screen.Description: A shield of light forms in front of you, blocking incoming attacks. For the duration, you have resistance to all fire, grass, ice, water, poison, and ghost type moves. If you were vulnerable to any of these types before activating this move, you take regular damage instead of double.
